title: Fair movie made better by the public !
review: I did see the movie three times.I think there is a big difference between a good movie,and a movie made good by the public.Blair Witch Project is a prime example of a fair movie made good by the public.I think the film makers did a good job of making this movie,but they did an even better job of hyping the movie.The tactics they used had people flocking by the hundreds to see this movie.This caused a chain reaction of was it real or not discussions all over the country.This proved to be the biggest hype for the film makers ever.People were coming back repeatedly to make a final decision on the realism of the movie.For this reason alone i gave the movie an eight.
